Description.Name: MisjumpCount
Description.Details: Misjump counter for number of misjumps and possibly MRB fines

positiveResult: <color=#FFA500>KF Console Diagnostic Check: Anomalies detected; total increased by +{RES_VALUE.ToString}</color>
negativeResult: <color=#FFA500>KF Console Diagnostic Check: Anomalies detected; total decreased by -{RES_VALUE.ToString}</color>
infinitivePositiveResult: <color=#FFA500>KF Console Diagnostic Check: Anomalies detected; total increased by +{RES_VALUE.ToString}</color>
infinitiveNegativeResult: <color=#FFA500>KF Console Diagnostic Check: Anomalies detected; total decreased by -{RES_VALUE.ToString}</color>
